text: Pino sulla Sponda del Lago Maggiore is a frazione of Maccagno con Pino e Veddasca in the Province of Varese in the Lombardy region in Italy. Until 2014, when it was merged with Maccagno and Veddasca to form the new municipality. Category:Former municipalities of Varese
title: Pino sulla Sponda del Lago Maggiore
